scripts.clean-install: rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf node_modules && npm install
scripts.npmpack: npm run clean-install && npm pack && tar -xvf tagspaces-tagspaces-common-webdav-1.0.4.tgz && shx cp -rL ./package/** ../../tagspaces/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-platforms/node_modules/@tagspaces/tagspaces-common-webdav && rimraf package
scripts.pkg-publish: rimraf package-lock.json && rimraf node_modules && npm install && npm publish --access public
